text: "Never Be the Same" is a 1980 song by Christopher Cross and is the third single from his debut studio album Christopher Cross. It went to number 15 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in Canada, number 41 in New Zealand, number 25 in Ireland and number 42 in Australia. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:Christopher Cross songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Never Be the Same (Christopher Cross song)
